name: Hat Maze
description:
Hat Maze is a 2D adventure game, where you must survive through several mazes, avoiding traps and enemies that can hurt you!

It tells the story of our hero, Mister Lamp, who, in attempt to set his people free, had to run away from a great evil to save his own life! Now, he needs your help to escape from these mazes and bring freedom and power back to people!
